amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to address the disproportionate regulatory burdens on community banks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 389 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 389 proposed by Senator Boozman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 389 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 389 proposed by Senator Boozman.
